languages.text: {n}Голос Калькасара становится сухим, как рапорты на столе, и угловатым, как литера Инквизиции на них.{/n} "Прошу воздержаться от ошибочных суждений. Я — лишь слуга Императора, и править не входит в мои должностные полномочия".

traits.locale_text: {n}Голос Калькасара становится сухим, как рапорты на столе, и угловатым, как литера Инквизиции на них.{/n} "Прошу воздержаться от ошибочных суждений. Я — лишь слуга Императора, и править не входит в мои должностные полномочия".
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Calcazar's voice turns as dry as the reports on the table, and as sharp as the symbol of the Inquisition stamped upon them.{/n} "I would not wish you to make any assumptions, for you would be quite mistaken. I am but a servant of the Emperor — governing is beyond my purview."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Калькасара становится сухим, как рапорты на столе, и угловатым, как литера Инквизиции на них.{/n} "Прошу воздержаться от ошибочных суждений. Я — лишь слуга Императора, и править не входит в мои должностные полномочия".

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar's voice turns as dry as the reports on the table, and as sharp as the "I" of the Inquisition stamped upon them.{/n} "I would not wish you to make any assumptions, for you would be quite mistaken. I am but a servant of the Emperor — governing is beyond my purview."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar's voice turns as dry as the reports on the table, and as sharp as the "I" of the Inquisition stamped upon them.{/n} "I would not wish you to make any assumptions, for you would be quite mistaken. I am but a servant of the Emperor — governing is beyond my purview."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar's voice turns as dry as the reports on the table, and as sharp as the "I" of the Inquisition stamped upon them.{/n} "I would not wish you to make any assumptions, for you would be quite mistaken. I am but a servant of the Emperor — governing is beyond my purview."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar's voice turns as dry as the reports on the table, and as sharp as the symbol of the Inquisition stamped upon them.{/n} "I would not wish you to make any assumptions, for you would be quite mistaken. I am but a servant of the Emperor — governing is beyond my purview."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}卡尔卡扎的声音变得像桌子上的报告一样干涩，但又像审判庭的徽记一样锐利。{/n}“我不希望你做任何假设，因为你的想法肯定会大错特错。我只不过是帝皇的仆人罢了，管理权并不在我的手中。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar's voice turns as dry as the reports on the table, and as sharp as the symbol of the Inquisition stamped upon them.{/n} "I would not wish you to make any assumptions, for you would be quite mistaken. I am but a servant of the Emperor — governing is beyond my purview."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡尔卡扎的声音变得像桌子上的报告一眼干涩，但又像审判庭的徽记一样锐利。{/n}“我不希望你做任何假设，因为你的想法肯定会大错特错。我只不过是帝皇的仆人罢了，管理权并不在我的手中。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}La voz de Calcazar se vuelve tan seca como los informes de la mesa y tan afilada como el símbolo de la Inquisición que llevan estampados.{/n} «Le agradecería que no suponga nada, porque se equivocaría. Soy un mero sirviente del Emperador. Gobernar es algo que va más allá de mis capacidades».
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar's voice turns as dry as the reports on the table, and as sharp as the symbol of the Inquisition stamped upon them.{/n} "I would not wish you to make any assumptions, for you would be quite mistaken. I am but a servant of the Emperor — governing is beyond my purview."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Calcazar se vuelve tan seca como los informes de la mesa y tan afilada como la «I» de la Inquisición que llevan estampados.{/n} «Le agradecería que no suponga nada, porque se equivocaría. Soy un mero sirviente del Emperador. Gobernar es algo que va más allá de mis capacidades».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}カルカサルの声は机上の報告書並に乾いており、かつその報告書に押印する異端審問庁の『印』並に鋭い。{/n}「想定は一切するな。大きな過ちを犯しかねない。私は皇帝の臣下にすぎぬ…統治は分に過ぎた行いだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar's voice turns as dry as the reports on the table, and as sharp as the symbol of the Inquisition stamped upon them.{/n} "I would not wish you to make any assumptions, for you would be quite mistaken. I am but a servant of the Emperor — governing is beyond my purview."

traits.locale_text: {n}カルカサルの声は机上の報告書並に乾いており、かつその報告書に押印する異端審問庁の『印』並に鋭い。{/n}「想定は一切するな。大きな過ちを犯しかねない。私は皇帝の臣下にすぎぬ…統治は分に過ぎた行いだ」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}La voix de Calcazar se fait aussi sèche que les rapports sur la table et il se raidit comme le symbole de l'Inquisition qui y est tamponné.{/n} « Je vous prierai de vous abstenir de tirer des conclusions sans fondement. Je ne suis qu'un simple serviteur de l'Empereur, ce n'est pas moi qui gouverne. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar's voice turns as dry as the reports on the table, and as sharp as the symbol of the Inquisition stamped upon them.{/n} "I would not wish you to make any assumptions, for you would be quite mistaken. I am but a servant of the Emperor — governing is beyond my purview."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de Calcazar se fait aussi sèche que les rapports sur la table et il se raidit comme le « I » de l'Inquisition qui y est tamponné.{/n} « Je vous prierai de vous abstenir de tirer des conclusions sans fondement. Je ne suis qu'un simple serviteur de l'Empereur, ce n'est pas moi qui gouverne. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Calcazars Stimme wird so emotionslos wie die Berichte auf dem Tisch und so scharf wie das darauf gestempelte Symbol der Inquisition.{/n} "Ihr solltet nicht von Annahmen ausgehen, denn sie würden sich als falsch erweisen. Ich bin nur ein Diener des Imperators – Herrschen fällt nicht in meine Zuständigkeit."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar's voice turns as dry as the reports on the table, and as sharp as the symbol of the Inquisition stamped upon them.{/n} "I would not wish you to make any assumptions, for you would be quite mistaken. I am but a servant of the Emperor — governing is beyond my purview."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazars Stimme wird so emotionslos wie die Berichte auf dem Tisch und so scharf wie das darauf gestempelte "I" der Inquisition.{/n} "Ihr solltet nicht von Annahmen ausgehen, denn sie würden sich als falsch erweisen. Ich bin nur ein Diener des Imperators – Herrschen fällt nicht in meine Zuständigkeit."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Calcazar'ın sesi, masadaki raporlar kadar kuru ve üzerlerine basılmış Engizisyon sembolü kadar keskin bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Suizan etmeni istemem, hayli yanılmış olursun çünkü. Ben, İmparator'un naçiz bir hizmetkârıyım. Hükümdarlık bana düşmez."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar's voice turns as dry as the reports on the table, and as sharp as the symbol of the Inquisition stamped upon them.{/n} "I would not wish you to make any assumptions, for you would be quite mistaken. I am but a servant of the Emperor — governing is beyond my purview."
